summary: This is an internal email regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein's status at the Metropolitan Correctional Center. It states that Epstein is being taken off of Psych Observation and needs to be housed with an appropriate cellmate. The email is dated July 30, 2019, just days before his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email, identified as inmate #76318-054, who is being taken off of Psych Observation and needs a new cellmate assignment.

events.title: Epstein Removed from Psych Observation
events.description: An internal email indicates inmate Jeffrey Epstein is being taken off of Psych Observation and needs to be housed with an appropriate cellmate.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email dated July 30, 2019, regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein's status.
It states that Epstein (inmate #76318-054) is being taken off of Psych Observation.
It directs that he needs to be housed with an appropriate cellmate.
This change in his supervision status occurred just days before his death on August 10, 2019.
